json.text: ALL THE LAND WHICH THOU SEEST
TO THEE WILL I GIVE IT
INDEED... HE WHO WATCHES OVER ISRAEL
HEARTY SHALOM TO ALL OF YOU.
I SAY "AGAIN" BECAUSE WE'VE BEEN GOING FOR 35 YEARS
AND WE'RE GOING TO KEEP ON GOING.
THIS TIME GOING TO THE LAND OF ISRAEL
DID YOU EVER GET THE FEELING PEOPLE DIDN'T LIKE YOU...
WELL IF YOU DO, YOU KNOW WHAT ITS LIKE TO BE A JEW
BECAUSE PEOPLE HAVE BEEN AT US SINCE THE BEGINNING.
FROM THE DAWN OF BIBLICAL REVELATION WE SEE GOD LEADING PEOPLE TO REAL ESTATE
AND THE DEVIL TRYING TO OFF END THEM OR US.
IN A WORLD TODAY WHERE ISRAEL IS SO DEBATABLE
WE WANT TO TAKE YOU TO THE REAL ESTATE.
WE WANT TO TAKE YOU THERE OFF THE BEATEN PATH, BY THE WAY.
MY GPS WILL GET YOU PLACES YOU NORMALLY DON'T SEE.
WE WANT TO TAKE YOU TO THE PAGES OF BIBLICAL LITERATURE
AND SEE WHAT SCRIPTURE SAYS ABOUT THE LAND OF ISRAEL.
MY GOOD FRIEND DAVID DOLAN, A FORMER CBS CORRESPONDENT
WILL GIVE US A MODERN VIEW
BUT I WANT TO TAKE YOU TO A BIBLICAL VIEW AT THE FIRST
AND SO OFF WE GO NOW TO FOLLOW IN THE FOOTSTEPS OF OUR FATHER ABRAHAM
AND JOURNEY TO THE LAND OF ISRAEL.
NOW THE LORD SAID UNTO ABRAM,
"UNTO A LAND THAT I WILL SHOW THEE."
"AND I WILL MAKE OF THEE A GREAT NATION"
"AND I WILL BLESS THEE AND MAKE THY NAME GREAT"
"AND I WILL BLESS THEM THAT BLESS THEE"
"AND IN THEE SHALL ALL FAMILIES OF THE EARTH BE BLESSED."
AND ABRAM TOOK SARAI HIS WIFE,
ALL THE SUBSTANCE AND PERSONS THEY HAD ACQUIRED IN HARAN
THAT A JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME
BEGINS WITH THE VERY FIRST STEPS
WELL COME WITH ME NOW AND JOURNEY WITH ME
AS WE WALK IN THE FOOTSTEPS OF OUR FATHER ABRAHAM.
FOR MANY OF US THE ROAD OF FAITH IS JUST THAT.
WE WANT TO CONSIDER THE FOOTSTEPS OF THE FATHER OF FAITH
AND TO HELP US I WANT TO SHOW YOU A MAP SO YOU CAN SOME VISION
FOR THE ROAD THAT HE TRAVELED.
IT'S A BIG MAP BUT HE TOOK SOME BIG STEPS.
HE MADE HIS WAY THROUGH MESOPOTAMIA,
A GREEK WORD MEANING "BETWEEN THE RIVERS",
HE GOES TO HARAN FOR A SEASON
UNTIL SUCH TIME AS THE LORD BECKONS HIM TO FINISH THE FINAL LEG OF THE JOURNEY
MAKING HIS WAY TO "ERETZ CANAAN" IN THE "LAND OF CANAAN".
AND IT'S GOING TO LEAD HIM TO THIS PLACE HERE "BETHEL"
AND IT'S NOT ONLY THIS PLACE HERE
LET ME GIVE YOU A WINDOW WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE.
THE PROMISE GIVEN OF A GREAT NATION, ABRAHAM THEN DEPARTS
AND HE MAKES HIS WAY TO THE LAND OF CANAAN,
OPEN YOUR BIBLES PLEASE TO GENESIS CHAPTER 12
AND LET'S FOLLOW IN THE FOOTSTEPS OF OUR FATHER ABRAHAM.
ABRAHAM IS NOTED AS PASSING THROUGH VARIOUS PLACES.
AND ISN'T IT LIKE A JOURNEY AS WE'RE GOING TO OUR INHERITANCE IN THE LORD?
THERE'S VARIOUS STOPS ALONG THE WAY.
THE LORD SAYS "I'LL GIVE YOU THE LAND OF CANAAN".
THERE STILL WERE PEOPLE USING THE TERM "CANAANITES"
EVEN WITH SOME SCATTERED PEOPLE MOVING ABOUT HERE
AND I WANT YOU TO HEAR ME PLEASE
IN VERSE 7 IN NO UNCERTAIN TERMS THE LORD SAYS...
FIRST THE LORD APPEARED TO HIM IN SOMETHING OF A VISION
AND SAID, "TO YOUR DESCENDANTS I WILL GIVE THIS LAND"...
LOOSE CONFEDERACIES MOVING AROUND IN DIFFERENT PLACES HERE.
AND SOME HAVE TAKEN RESIDENCY IN THE CITIES,
SMALL FLEDGLING CITIES IF YOU WILL,
BUT AS PEOPLE ARE MIGRATING ALONG THE FERTILE CRESCENT AND SETTLING DOWN HERE...
BUT THE LORD BRINGS ABRAHAM HERE
AND HE SAYS, "LISTEN I HAVE GIVEN THIS LAND TO YOU"
IN NO UNCERTAIN TERMS OF PROMISE
"TO YOUR DESCENDANTS I WILL GIVE IT".
AND WHAT DOES HE DO IN RESPONSE TO HEARING THAT?
WE'RE TOLD SOMETHING THAT ABRAHAM HAS DONE MORE THAN ONCE.
AS WE MAKE OUR JOURNEY FROM THE WOMB TO THE TOMB
WHERE WE HAVE SOMETHING OF AN EXISTENTIAL ENCOUNTER WITH THE LORD
WHERE WE HEAR HIM SPEAK TO US.
HE STIRS US UP IN OUR HEARTS.
BUT THERE'S A SENSE IF WE HAVE A LITTLE "RUACH HAKODESH" DWELLING IN US, A LITTLE "HOLY SPIRIT"
THAT WE'RE BEING DRIVEN ALONG BY A FORCE THAT'S NOT OUR OWN.
AND INDIVIDUALS THUS INCLINED WITHIN THAT CONTEXT
ARE MINDED ALONG THE WAY TO BUILD SOME ALTARS,
TO TAKE SOME TIME OUT TO WORSHIP THE LORD.
ABRAHAM UPON HEARING AT THIS PLACE IS MINDED TO DO MUCH THAT.
WE'RE TOLD, HAVING HEARD THE PROMISE,
AND BY THE WAY I'M COMING TO YOU FROM THAT PLACE RIGHT NOW.
BECAUSE THERE'S NOT MUCH AT ONE LEVEL
BUT ONE PILGRIM DID MANY YEARS AGO
AND WE'RE ALL ABOUT FOLLOWING THE OFF ROAD STORY OF THE BIBLE
WHERE THE TOURISTS BUSES DON'T COME.
IT'S EASY TO GET A CAMERA CREW,
OR EASIER I SHOULD SAY TO GET A CREW IN
TO TAKE YOU TO SEE SOME THINGS THAT THEY HAVEN'T BUILT HIGHWAYS FOR OTHERS TO GET TO.
IN ANY CASE WE'RE IN PROXIMITY TO THAT PLACE
HERE BETWEEN THOSE TWO CITIES NOTED WHERE ABRAHAM IS MINDED TO WORSHIP THE LORD.
HE BUILDS AN ALTAR TO THE LORD
AND HE CALLS ON THE NAME OF THE LORD.
NOW I CALL UPON GOOD PEOPLE WHO CALL UPON THE NAME OF THE LORD TO READ THE BIBLE.
HOW INDIVIDUALS THAT LAY SIEGE TO THE CLAIM OF BEING BIBLE BELIEVERS
BUT I DON'T KNOW WHAT BIBLE THEY'RE READING
BECAUSE I'M CLUELESS HOW SOMEONE CAN BE A BIBLE BELIEVER ON THE ONE HAND
AND A NON-SUPPORTER OF JEWISH PEOPLE IN THIS LAND ON THE OTHER.
IT MAKES NO SENSE TO ME WHATSOEVER.
THEY CAN CALL THEMSELVES BISHOP, PROFESSOR, DOCTOR, REVEREND... WHATEVER...
BUT I'M CLUELESS HOW SOMEONE CAN READ THE BIBLE AND NOT JUST HOLD ON TO WHAT THE BIBLE SAYS.
WELL, I WANT TO DO THAT
AND SO I WANT TO COMMEND TO YOU,
NOT JUST AS I LEAVE THIS ONE TEACHING SEGMENT,
BUT AS I INTRODUCE A SERIES TO REMIND YOU,
WE'RE GONNA NOT ONLY FOLLOW ABRAHAM
BUT WE'RE GOING TO FOLLOW HIS PROGENY.
WE'LL FOLLOW THEM AROUND THE LAND....
FOR INSIGHTFUL PERSPECTIVES OF ISRAEL AND BIBLE PROPHECY
ASK FOR OUR FREE MONTHLY NEWSLETTER
WHEN YOU CALL BE SURE TO ASK FOR OUR FREE CATALOGUE
WITH THE LATEST VIDEOS, BOOKS, AND MUSIC.
INCLUDES READING PACKETS, TEACHING CDS, AND MAIL-IN TESTS.
YOU MAY WANT TO JOIN US ON AN UPCOMING TOUR OF ISRAEL OR PETRA
OR CRUISE THE MEDITERRANEAN VISITING GREECE AND EPHESUS.
PLEASE CONTACT US FOR MORE INFORMATION.
AND NOW FROM THE OLD CITY IN JERUSALEM
OF THE BEGINNING OF THE MODERN STATE OF ISRAEL.
I'M STANDING IN FRONT OF ONE OF THE OLDEST CHURCHES ON EARTH...
THE CHURCH OF THE HOLY SEPULCHRE IN THE OLD CITY OF JERUSALEM.
CHRISTIANS FROM AROUND THE WORLD ARE HERE VISITING THIS SITE,
THE SITE THAT MANY BELIEVE JESUS WAS CRUCIFIED, BURIED, ROSE FROM THE DEAD
ON A LITTLE HILL, THAT'S INSIDE THE CHURCH, CALLED GOLGOTHA.
DESTROYED THE STATE OF JUDEA IN THE YEAR 135 AFTER A JEWISH REVOLT.
THE TEMPLE HAD ALREADY BEEN DESTROYED IN A.D. 70,
REPLACED BY A TEMPLE TO A PAGAN GOD, JUPITER.
HERE THERE WAS A PAGAN TEMPLE TO THE GOD VENUS.
BECAUSE THE ROMANS KNEW THAT CHRISTIANS REVERED THIS SIGHT AS SOME SORT OF A SPECIAL PLACE.
A JEWISH MINI-STATE REMAINED IN THE LAND AFTER JUDEA WAS DESTROYED
A NAME THAT WAS DELIBERATELY PICKED TO INSULT THE JEWS
BECAUSE IT CAME FROM THEIR ANCIENT ENEMY THE PHILISTINES.
UP IN THE NORTHERN GALILEE A JEWISH STATE REMAINED IN EFFECT.
IN FACT THE SANHEDRIN WAS RECONSTITUTED THERE.
IN THE 4TH CENTURY THE ROMAN EMPIRE WAS DIVIDED.
THE EASTERN HALF IS RULED BY THE BYZANTINES FROM CONSTANTINOPLE.
THE WESTERN HALF REMAINED UNDER ROMAN RULE.
THE BYZANTINES FIERCELY PERSECUTED THE JEWS HERE IN THE LAND
AND MANY OF THEM FLED TO THE EAST TO MESOPOTAMIA OR BABYLON.
IN FACT, THE RECORDS SHOW IN THE 6TH CENTURY THERE WERE 43 JEWISH COMMUNITIES REMAINING.
THE CHURCH OF THE HOLY SEPULCHRE THAT YOU SEE BEHIND ME HAS 6 DENOMINATIONS OPERATING IN IT...
THE GREEK ORTHODOX CHURCH WHICH WAS BASED IN CONSTANTINOPLE BUT THAT BECAME ISTANBUL...
THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH IS THERE...
ARMENIAN ORTHODOX CHRISTIANS ALSO ARE THERE...
THE SYRIAN ORTHODOX CHURCH OPERATES THERE...
IT'S NOT ALWAYS EASY FOR THESE DIFFERENT DENOMINATIONS TO BE TOGETHER IN THIS BUILDING
IN THE YEAR 614 THE PERSIANS INVADED THE LAND,
BUT THEY WEREN'T THERE VERY LONG.
BUT JUST A FEW YEARS AFTER THAT IN 638 A NEW RELIGION, ISLAM,
SENT IT'S FORCES UP TO THIS LAND
BEHIND ME YOU SEE THE TOWER OF DAVID.
IT'S GONE BETWEEN CHRISTIAN, JEWISH AND MUSLIM RULE OVER THE CENTURIES.
THEY ALSO CAPTURED THE TEMPLE MOUNT;
THEY BEGAN WORK ON A MAGNIFICENT SHRINE, "THE DOME OF THE ROCK"
THAT WAS FINISHED IN THE YEAR 691.
THE MUSLIMS THAT RULED HERE DIDN'T SET THIS UP AS A CAPITAL.
THEY RULED THE CITY BUT THEY DID SO FROM BAGHDAD,
AND THE DIFFERENT ARMIES FROM THOSE DIFFERENT AREAS WOULD CLASH HERE IN THE CITY OFTEN.
IN THE YEAR 1009 THE CHURCH WAS DESTROYED BY CALIPH AL HAKIM.
THIS WAS ONE OF THE PROMPTS FOR THE CRUSADES.
THE POPE IN ROME SAID, "WE MUST GO TO THE HOLY CITY",
AND IN 1096 CRUSADER FORCES LANDED DOWN ON THE COAST
CAPTURING THE CITY OF JERUSALEM IN 1099.
BUT IT DIDN'T LAST VERY LONG.
THEY WERE DEFEATED BY THE MUSLIM FORCES LED BY SALADIN
UP NEAR THE SEA OF GALILEE IN THE YEAR 1187.
JERUSALEM WAS AGAIN UNDER MUSLIM RULE
AND THEY WERE FINALLY PUSHED OUT OF THE ENTIRE LAND IN 1291.
MEANWHILE JEWS WERE BEING EXPELLED FROM VARIOUS EUROPEAN COUNTRIES.
THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH WAS UNHAPPY THAT THEY HAD HELPED THE MUSLIMS TO RE-TAKE THE CITY.
FINALLY FROM SPAIN AND PORTUGAL IN 1492 AND 1497.
THE MUSLIMS AGAIN WERE RULING THIS LAND.
AGAIN IT WAS DIFFERENT MUSLIM GROUPS OFTEN CLASHING,
THE MAMLUKS, THEY WERE BASED IN DAMASCUS AND IN CAIRO.
AND THEN IN THE YEAR 1516 A NEW EMPIRE TOOK CONTROL,
THE TURKISH OTTOMAN EMPIRE GAINED THIS CITY AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS.
AND THESE MAGNIFICENT WALLS THAT YOU SEE BEHIND ME WERE BUILT BY SULEIMAN, THE MAGNIFICENT.
AT THAT TIME THE RECORDS SHOW THERE WERE 30 JEWISH COMMUNITIES IN THE LAND.
AND THE TURKISH MUSLIMS WERE FAIRLY TOLERANT OF THE JEWS LIVING HERE,
PERSECUTION DECREASED AND JEWISH LIFE WAS THRIVING FAIRLY WELL.
BUT THAT WAS AT THE BEGINNING.
TOWARDS THE END OF THE OTTOMAN RULE MORE ANTI-JEWISH RULERS EMERGED THAT PERSECUTED THE JEWS
AND IT WAS A BAD SITUATION THAT ONLY STARTED TO CHANGE
WHEN THE EUROPEAN POWERS GAINED MORE AND MORE INFLUENCE IN THE 1800s.
BUT DAVID DOES SUCH A GOOD JOB WITH IT.
AND WHEN IT COMES TO THE LAND OF ISRAEL, IT'S NOT JUST HISTORY
AND WE LOVE EXPOSING IT ALL TO YOU.
THEY CAN GET TO IT FIRST HAND CAN'T THEY?
YOU DO AN EXCELLENT JOB OF
THE PRESENCE OF THE LORD IN THE HOLY LAND IS SO STRONG
OUR TOURS BOOK 8 AND 9 MONTHS IN ADVANCE.
WE'RE ALREADY SELLING FOR TOURS MANY MONTHS IN ADVANCE.
ONE THING PEOPLE NEED TO KNOW DR. SEIF IS
AND YOU KNOW ONE OF OUR RECENT PASSENGERS, DEBORAH,
HAD AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE ON THE SEA OF GALILEE.
SO LET'S GO TO DEBORAH RIGHT NOW
AND LET HER TELL YOU PERSONALLY
I UNDERSTAND THIS IS YOUR FIRST TIME TO ISRAEL.
HOW ARE YOU ENJOYING IT? >>I LOVE IT.
I'VE RESEARCHED TRIPS A LONG TIME
AND WANTED SOMEONE THAT REALLY UNDERSTOOD THE JEWISH PERSPECTIVE.
THE THING THAT I LIKE THE MOST
WAS THE SEA OF GALILEE AND THE EXPERIENCE...
THE HOLY SPIRIT JUST CAME ON OUR BOAT
AND PEOPLE WERE PRAISING AND WORSHIPING
AND IT WAS THE MOST AMAZING THING I'VE BEEN APART OF
WE'RE JUST SO GLAD TO HAVE YOU ON THE ZOLA TOUR. >>THANK YOU.
I INVITE YOU TO COME WITH US
SO YOU CAN HAVE AN EXPERIENCE SIMILAR TO DEBORAH'S.
EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT OUR TOURS IS AVAILABLE AT
I'M IN THE OFFICE EVERY DAY AND WOULD LOVE TO TALK WITH YOU.
AND WE'LL GET YOU TO THE LAND OF ISRAEL.
CAN'T GO BUT STILL WANT TO KNOW?
TIMELY NEWS RELATED TO THE JEWS.
WE WANT YOU TO HAVE IT.
IS SOMETHING WE WANT YOU TO HAVE AS WELL.
TALKING ABOUT BIBLICAL INFORMATION THAT'S RELATED TO TODAY.
THAT RELIGION REALLY HAS A WAY
THAT I DID JUST A BIT AGO
COMING OUT HERE TO CHECK ON
AND OF COURSE HE WAS THE EMPEROR
AND SHE WAS THE QUEEN MOTHER >>SHE HAS TO GET PLENTY OF VOTES
SO THEY HAD A LOT OF THAT.
BUT THEN LATER ON WE SEE
THEY CAME DOWN OF COURSE TO
OF JEWS AND MUSLIMS AND OTHERS
AND MANY OF THEM WERE KILLED.
AND THE MUSLIM RULE LATER ON
SO VERY POSITIVE IN THAT SENSE
THE ONLY SPOT ON EARTH JEFF
IT IS UNIQUE IN THAT WAY
OF THE CHURCHES GO AT IT.
ABOUT HOW THE WAY THE MONKS
AND THIS WAS BECAUSE ONE GROUP,
AND THERE ARE PLENTY OF EXAMPLES
HAS A WAY OF ELICITING ENERGIES.
IT TAKES THEM TO INTERESTING PLACES DOESN'T IT?
IT REMINDS ME OF GOD'S LOVING HEART IN SO MANY WAYS.
LOVE FOR PEOPLE, THE JEWS, AND FOR ALL OF US FOR THAT MATTER.
GOD'S BINDING LOVE IS SO AMPLY ATTESTED IN BIBLICAL LITERATURE
AND HERE THE LATE ZOLA LEVITT INTERVIEWS A RABBI WHO GIVES VOICE TO THAT AND MORE.
ON ONE OF ZOLA'S MANY TRIPS TO ISRAEL
AT A WEST BANK SETTLEMENT CALLED KFAR EDOMIM.
THE RABBI READ FROM THE BOOK OF GENESIS
AND TALKED ABOUT GOD'S EVERLASTING COVENANT WITH ABRAHAM.
"TO BE UNTO YOU A GOD AND TO YOUR CHILDREN AFTER YOU."
THIS COVENANT OF THE LAND THAT WAS MADE BETWEEN GOD AND ABRAHAM
WAS NOT A COVENANT OF THE PAST;
IT IS A COVENANT OF THE PRESENT
AND A COVENANT OF THE FUTURE.
B'RIT OLAM, AN EVERLASTING, AN ETERNAL COVENANT.
"I SHALL GIVE YOU THE ENTIRE LAND OF CANAAN."
NOT TO BE GIVEN AWAY TO OTHERS.
SO OBVIOUSLY YOU'RE NOT IN FAVOR OF GIVING ANY OF THIS AWAY.
THIS IS THE HEARTLAND OF THE JEWISH PEOPLE.
THIS IS WHERE OUR FOREFATHERS TREAD.
WHEN WE HIKE IN THESE HILLS
WE FOLLOW THE FOOTSTEPS OF ABRAHAM AND ISAAC AND JACOB
NO HUMAN BEING WANTS TO GIVE AWAY HIS HOME TO ANYBODY
AND WE, THE CHOSEN PEOPLE, DO NOT WANT TO GIVE ONE INCH OF OUR LAND TO ANYONE ELSE.
THIS IS THE LAND PROMISED TO US BY GOD.
WHEN I WAS A LITTLE KID I LEARNED A SONG,
"THIS LAND IS YOUR LAND, THIS LAND IS MY LAND."
WE LOOK HERE IN THE BOOK GENESIS
WHERE THE LORD COMMENDS THIS REAL ESTATE
UP TO THE EUPHRATES RIVER HERE.
THE EASTERN BORDER IS A LITTLE VAGUER
IS THAT THE LAND PROMISED TO ABRAHAM
IS A LOT BIGGER THAN THE LITTLE SLIVER OF TODAY THAT'S CALLED THE MODERN STATE OF ISRAEL.
PEOPLE SAY "THE JEWS ARE TAKING OVER THE WORLD"...
PERSONALLY I'M ALL ABOUT WANTING TO EMPLOY SOME BIBLICAL REALITY
HENCE, THE SERIES ON THE LAND OF ISRAEL.
THIS WEEK WE LOOKED AT ABRAHAM,
NEXT WEEK WE LOOK AT ISAAC.
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR GOING ON THE JOURNEY AND AS YOU GO NOW,
PRAY FOR THE PEACE OF JERUSALEM
